tweets.content:
KALSHI CEO @mansourtarek_ ON CONVICTION

"The only way this becomes a big business is we need to legitimize it as a financial instrument.

It has to be something thatâ€™s approved by the federal government â€” something we can one day list on brokerages, work with market makers on, and take fully mainstream, even put in the App Store.

Not some side website where people quietly bet or trade. I want it to sit at the center of Wall Street. Weâ€™re going to reimagine the entire ecosystem around it.

We were so convicted in that vision â€” we said we wouldnâ€™t waver, no matter what.

Either we die as a company, or we make this legal."

Two years ago, we sued the CFTC.
